verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of mercy <S%H2617><s%> and judgment: <S%H4941><s%> to you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> will I sing. <S%H2167><s%>

I will behave <S%H7919><s%> myself wisely <S%H7919><s%> in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%> O when <S%H4970><s%> will you come <S%H935><s%> to me? I will walk <S%H1980><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> with a perfect <S%H8537><s%> heart. <S%H3824><s%>

I will set <S%H7896><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wicked <S%H1100><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> my eyes: <S%H5869><s%> I hate <S%H8130><s%> the work <S%H6213><s%> of them that turn <S%H7750><s%> aside; <S%H7750><s%> it shall not stick <S%H1692><s%> to me.
A fraudulent <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from me: I will not know <S%H3045><s%> a wicked <S%H7451><s%> person.

Whoever privately <S%H5643><s%> slanders <S%H3960><s%> his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> him will I cut <S%H6789><s%> off: him that has an high <S%H1362><s%> look <S%H5869><s%> and a proud <S%H7342><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> will not I suffer. <S%H3201><s%>

My eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be on the faithful <S%H539><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> that they may dwell <S%H3427><s%> with me: he that walks <S%H1980><s%> in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> he shall serve <S%H8334><s%> me.

He that works <S%H6213><s%> deceit <S%H7423><s%> shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> my house: <S%H1004><s%> he that tells <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall not tarry <S%H3559><s%> in my sight. <S%H5869><s%>

I will early <S%H1242><s%> destroy <S%H6789><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> that I may cut <S%H3772><s%> off all <S%H3605><s%> wicked <S%H205><s%> doers <S%H6466><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
